# phoneticOrganizationName

**Instance Property**

The phonetic name of the organization associated with the contact.

## Declaration

```swift
var phoneticOrganizationName: String { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property contains a string that specifies the pronunciation of the contact’s organization name.

## Setting Work Information

- **jobTitle**: The contact’s job title.
- **departmentName**: The name of the department associated with the contact.
- **organizationName**: The name of the organization associated with the contact.

items.description: The name of the department associated with the contact.
